name: Healthyfied Binakol
description: This Healthyfied Binakol recipe is your ticket to a delicious, low-carb, and low-sugar meal, featuring the savory combination of whole chicken with the tropical flavors of coconut. Ideal for those looking for healthy recipes without compromising taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your ingredients: finely chop the garlic, slice the green onions, dice the white onion, slice the ginger, and shred the coconut meat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, combine the whole chicken, sliced ginger, chopped garlic, diced white onion, and lemon grass. Pour in the coconut water, and season with salt and black pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the pot to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 45 minutes or until the chicken is fully cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the shredded coconut meat and sliced green onions. Simmer for an additional 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
